name: The HeadShot(Alpha)
description:
The HeadShot is an Horror Zombie Survival game. In which you are need to save your locality/town from the zombies. 

Why you should play this game?

If you want to get a mysterious horror experience, you must try this game. As this is having mysteries in it. 

This Game is under development right now. The version which we are releasing is a Demo/Alpha version of the game. The final version will be released soon.

Many people have helped me in making this game.

Special Thanks to:

Manish Chakradhari : 3D Aritst

Ashutosh Singh : Programmer

Shubh Aggarwal : Game Tester

DJ Maesen : Gun Model
